name: Queen of The Anthill
description:
This game was made and designed as part of the Lift Off Project in CMGT at Saxion University. It is a two-player game where one player controls the ants the other controls the pillbug. You have to fend of against the incoming bugs and survive for as long as possible.

The game is intended to be played using a custom controller. This is a keyboard controlled version so people can play it online:

Controls:

  • Player One
    • right and left arrows - rotate
    • up arrow - shoot
  • Player Two
    • A and D - Rotate
    • W - Shoot
  • Combo
    • Both CTRL keys at the same time

Made by: M.A.S.H.

  • Designers:
    • Dan Markov
    • Hansje Dispa
  • Artists:
    • Allan Bukowski
    • Tycho Brandsma
    • Olga Slabozhanova
  • Engineers:
